```{r load libraries, include=FALSE}
# If you don't have these, install them first:
# install.packages("tidyverse")

# install.packages("forecast")

# For data loading, manipulation (dplyr), and plotting (ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
# For easier date-time parsing
library(lubridate)
# For k-means and silhouette analysis
library(cluster)
# For cluster visualization (e.g., elbow plot)
library(factoextra)
# For time-series forecasting
library(forecast)

# Set system language to English for consistent outputs
Sys.setlocale("LC_ALL", "en_US.UTF-8")
Sys.setenv(LANGUAGE = 'en')

# Set a consistent seed for reproducibility
set.seed(123)
```


